cosmological_parameters.status: PARTIAL - Values need updating to latest data

parameters.source: Standard cosmology calculation from g* = 3.91 at freeze-out

claimed_bounds.note: LZ first results published 2022 (arXiv:2207.03764), setting world-leading limits. Document claim is plausible for 2024 data, but I cannot verify exact bound without web access.
claimed_bounds.mass_dependence: Cross-section scales as ~1/M_W², so bounds are weaker at higher masses

document_prediction.status: At LZ boundary - REQUIRES WEB VERIFICATION

citations.actual_reference: T.H.R. Skyrme, Proc. Roy. Soc. Lond. A 260, 127 (1961); Nucl. Phys. 31, 556 (1962)
citations.note: Skyrme's original papers introduced topological solitons in pion field theory. Document citation is accurate.
citations.relevance: HIGH - Foundation for soliton stabilization mechanism

citations.actual_reference: G. Adkins, C. Nappi, E. Witten, Nucl. Phys. B 228, 552 (1983)
citations.note: This is THE seminal paper on Skyrme model for baryons. Formula M = (6π²f)/e |Q| is correct (equation 2.20 in original).
citations.relevance: CRITICAL - Used for W soliton mass prediction

citations.likely_reference: M. Pospelov, A. Ritz, M. Voloshin, Phys. Lett. B 662, 53 (2008) OR Pospelov & Ritz, Phys. Lett. B 671, 391 (2009)
citations.note: Pospelov has multiple papers on hidden sectors and dark matter circa 2008. The specific claim about Higgs portal requires verification of exact paper.
citations.recommendation: SPECIFY exact paper (arXiv number or full citation)

citations.actual_reference: B. Patt and F. Wilczek, hep-ph/0605188 (2006)
citations.note: This is indeed one of the foundational Higgs portal papers, though the concept appeared in earlier work (Silveira & Zee 1985, McDonald 1994).
citations.recommendation: CLARIFY if this is 'original' or just a key reference. Earlier work exists.

citations.actual_reference: D. Kaplan, M. Luty, K. Zurek, Phys. Rev. D 79, 115016 (2009), arXiv:0901.4117
citations.note: This is THE foundational ADM paper. Citation is accurate.
citations.relevance: CRITICAL - Core production mechanism for W condensate DM
citations.note_2: Document correctly identifies ADM as resolution to freeze-out tension

formulas.note: Exact formula from ANW paper. Document uses this correctly.

formulas.document_formula: σ_SI = (λ²_HΦ f²_N μ²_N m²_N)/(π m⁴_h M²_W)
formulas.note: Standard spin-independent WIMP-nucleus scattering formula. Consistent with literature.
formulas.reference: See Goodman et al. (1985), Jungman et al. (1996)

formulas.note: Standard ADM formula. Follows from number density conservation.

questions_requiring_literature_search.question: Are there other W-vertex/4th vertex DM proposals?
questions_requiring_literature_search.note: The stella octangula W-vertex as DM appears novel to CG framework, but comprehensive literature search required.

questions_requiring_literature_search.question: Are there similar Higgs portal models with TeV-scale DM?
questions_requiring_literature_search.note: TeV-scale Higgs portal DM is well-studied (e.g., MSSM neutralino, singlet scalar DM). CG prediction M_W ≈ 1.7 TeV with λ ≈ 0.036 is within explored parameter space.
questions_requiring_literature_search.distinguishing_feature: CG derives portal coupling GEOMETRICALLY rather than as free parameter

questions_requiring_literature_search.question: Is ADM mechanism novel or established?
questions_requiring_literature_search.note: ADM is well-established paradigm (Kaplan-Luty-Zurek 2009, Petraki-Volkas 2013 review). CG application to W condensate uses standard ADM framework.
questions_requiring_literature_search.novelty: Connection to geometric chirality in CG is novel application

predictions.verification: REQUIRES INDEPENDENT REVIEW of geometric argument

predictions.note: Consistent with Skyrme formula (using e = 2.718, not elementary charge)
Derived from domain boundary overlap integral (§13). Independent calculation needed.
predictions.plausibility: Value λ ~ 0.02-0.05 is plausible for geometric overlap

predictions.required_for_relic: To match Ω_DM/Ω_b ≈ 5.5 with M_W = 1.68 TeV

predictions.note: Claims to be at LZ boundary. Verification script needed.

important_missing.relevance: MEDIUM - Earlier Higgs portal work predating Patt & Wilczek

important_missing.recommendation: ADD - Provides broader context for ADM mechanism

important_missing.relevance: CRITICAL - Source for direct detection bounds
important_missing.recommendation: ADD - Must cite experimental bound source

important_missing.relevance: CRITICAL - Source for Ω_DM h², η_B
important_missing.recommendation: ADD - Currently implicit, should be explicit

potential_updates.note: Cannot verify without web access. LZ continues taking data, bounds may have improved.

potential_updates.action: CHECK DESI 2024 BAO results for updated cosmological parameters

confidence_assessment.justification:
Without web access, I can verify:
  ✓ All PDG values are correct from local cache
  ✓ Major citations (Skyrme, ANW, Kaplan-Luty-Zurek) are accurate
  ✓ Standard formulas are correct
  ✓ Arithmetic in predictions is self-consistent
  
  But I CANNOT verify:
  ✗ Exact LZ 2024 bounds
  ✗ Whether Pospelov 2008 is the right reference
  ✗ Completeness of prior work comparison
  ✗ Latest experimental updates
confidence_assessment.verification_level: PARTIAL - Local cache verified, literature requires web search
